summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Orcas Street from 42nd Avenue South to a point 100 feet east of Renton Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7885 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district, payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", repealing Ordinance No. 48732, approved April 28, 1925.
